content.raw:
This is turning out to have more edge cases than expected. 
I fixed a few bugs involving negative numbers just now. 

Numbers with scientific notation seem to still cause problems do we want to have arrow key switching for them as well? 
This is a bit tricky and I don't think that it's worth it. I would personally just add a check if the number is scientific and only if not have the feature active. Thoughts?
content.html:
This is turning out to have more edge cases than expected. I fixed a few bugs involving negative numbers just now.

Numbers with scientific notation seem to still cause problems do we want to have arrow key switching for them as well? This is a bit tricky and I don't think that it's worth it. I would personally just add a check if the number is scientific and only if not have the feature active. Thoughts?
